name: Smart Series Presents: JaJa's Adventure
summary: Based on the nationally recognized Smart Kids series, this game is specifically designed to be enjoyed by even the youngest of gamers. Join JaJa and his friends on an exciting adventure across land and sea on a quest to rescue their beloved pet from the dastardly Captain Momalon and his gang! Travel through beautiful valleys, dark caverns, and magical forests while solving various puzzles, rhythm matching, fishing, and more!
